history_of_present_illness.headache_details: Patient describes a 'tight band' sensation around the head. Does not include throbbing or pulsing.
history_of_present_illness.triggers: Reports increased stress at work and long hours staring at a computer screen.
history_of_present_illness.onset_duration_severity: Lasts 4-6 hours; occurs 3 times per week. Severity 4/10.
history_of_present_illness.associated_symptoms: Neck stiffness. Denies nausea, vomiting, or sensitivity to light/sound.

S.past_medical_history: Occasional tension headaches in the past; no history of migraines.
S.social_history: Works as a software engineer; drinks 4 cups of coffee daily.

O.physical_exam: Tenderness noted in the bilateral trapezius and paraspinal neck muscles. Neurological exam (CN II-XII) is intact. No focal deficits.
O.diagnostic_results: No imaging indicated at this time.

A.preliminary_assessment: The 'band-like' distribution and lack of migraine features (nausea/photophobia) point to Tension-Type Headache. Likely exacerbated by poor ergonomics and high caffeine intake.
A.ruling_out: Migraine without aura, Caffeine withdrawal headache, Cluster headache.

recommendations: Acetaminophen 500mg as needed at onset of symptoms.
Gradual reduction of daily caffeine intake.
P.education: Advised on stress management techniques and '20-20-20' rule for screen time (every 20 mins, look 20 feet away for 20 seconds).
